name: Johnnie BYRD, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Byrd v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Johnnie BYRD, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 13th day of June, 2002, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Tara Leigh Patterson, Robert Campolongo, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and P’arole.
casebody.head_matter:
798 A.2d 1275
Johnnie BYRD, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 55 MAP 2002.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 13, 2002.
Johnnie Byrd, Pittsburgh, pro se.
Tara Leigh Patterson, Robert Campolongo, Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and P’arole.
